      • createNews

        public ErrorCode createNews(java.lang.Object creator,
                   java.lang.String title,
                   java.lang.String text)
        Creates a new News with the given, title and text. Creator will be the author of the news.
        Parameters:
        creator - Author of the news
        title - Title of the news
        text - text of the news
        Returns:
        ErrorCode

      • searchForNews

        public java.util.LinkedList<News> searchForNews()
        search in the news from favourised labels and users and returns the news in a LinkedList.
        Returns:
        a list that contains the actual news
